info.description:
This API will return a collection of Service Recipe Data.

The base endpoint URL for this API in production is: `https://marko.aramark.net/v2/service/recipe`.

For testing the API with the "Try" tool on this page or in your app, use either our testing server "qa-marko" or our development server "dev-marko".
info.title: Service Recipe

get.description: Returns Service Recipes with Nutrition Data Updates

lastModifiedDateParam.name: last_modified_date
lastModifiedDateParam.description: Last Modified Date of the data

bypassCacheParam.name: bypass-cache
bypassCacheParam.description: This HTTP Header variable will bypass cache

smokeParam.name: smoke
smokeParam.description: When set to 'true' this HTTP Header variable will route to the Integration environment.  Only applicable in QA Server.

apikey.name: apikey
apikey.description: This HTTP Header variable will verify security

site_id.description: Site ID for the Storage Area

location_id.description: Location ID for the Storage Area

storage_area_order.description: Sort Order of the Storage Area
